items.title: Apple broadens App Storeâ€™s age rating system
items.description: Apple has expanded its age rating system to include 13+, 16+, and 18+ ratings, in addition to the existing ratings for younger users.

items.title: Tesla is reportedly behind on its pledge to build 5,000 Optimus bots this year
items.description: Tesla is behind on its goal to produce at least 5,000 Optimus humanoid robots by the end of 2025.
